```{r, warning=FALSE, error=FALSE}
server <- function(input, output, session) {
  
  semester_1 <- reactive({
      hectimetables::class_optim(1, f.obj, f.con, f.dir,
              input$credits_1, input$CORE_credits_1, input$ELECTIVE_credits_1, input$Moments_1, class=input$Classes_1)})

  output$timetable_1 <- renderTable({
    hectimetables::display_text_timetable(1, semester_1())})

  output$timetable_1_graph <- renderPlot({
    hectimetables::display_visual_timetable(1, semester_1())})
  
  semester_2 <- reactive({
    hectimetables::class_optim(2, f.obj, f.con, f.dir,
              input$credits_2, input$CORE_credits_2, input$ELECTIVE_credits_2,
              input$Moments_2, class=input$Classes_2)})
  
  output$timetable_2 <- renderTable({
    hectimetables::display_text_timetable(2, semester_2())})

  output$timetable_2_graph <- renderPlot({
    hectimetables::display_visual_timetable(2, semester_2())})

  semester_3 <- reactive({
    hectimetables::class_optim(3, f.obj, f.con, f.dir,
              input$credits_3, input$CORE_credits_3, input$ELECTIVE_credits_3,
              input$Moments_3, class=input$Classes_3)})

  output$timetable_3 <- renderTable({
  hectimetables::display_text_timetable(3, semester_3())})

  output$timetable_3_graph <- renderPlot({
    hectimetables::display_visual_timetable(3, semester_3())})
}
```

```{r}
shinyApp(ui, server)
```
